title: Charlotte Crosby enjoys romantic dinner in front of Sydney Opera House with boyfriend Joshua Ritchie
text:
Charlotte Crosby has wasted no time in seeing Sydney's sights after touching down in Australia.

The Geordie Shore personality enjoyed a romantic date night overlooking the city's iconic Opera House with her boyfriend Joshua Ritchie.

Taking to Instagram on Thursday night, she shared a video of herself in a form-fitting black two-piece, posing in front of the dazzling backdrop.

The 29-year-old captioned the video: 'Date night with a view.'

Charlotte flaunted her svelte figure in a long-sleeved one-shouldered top and a body-con skirt.

She accessorised her date night look with a layered, gold necklace, a watch, and a tartan clutch.

Cute! Reality stars Charlotte Crosby and Josh Ritchie (pictured) first began dating in 2018

Iconic! Charlotte Crosby (pictured) shared a video of herself in a form fitting black two-piece, posing in front of the Sydney Opera House

Earlier in the day, Charlotte and Josh hit Bondi Beach to enjoy Sydney's sunny spring weather.

She shared a clip of revellers relaxing on the sand, before turning the camera to Josh as he stripped off his top.

Later on social media, Charlotte admitted travelling across the globe was starting to take its toll.



Jet-setter: Charlotte admitted travelling across the globe was starting to take its toll

Talking to her followers on Instagram Stories while she lay in bed, Charlotte said: 'The jet lag's started to kick in for me and Josh.

'I'd put the phone on him but he's naked.'

Charlotte and fellow reality TV star Josh, who appeared in the UK's first season of Love Island, first began dating in 2018.

The pair recently took part in relationship counselling on the UK show Celebs Go Dating, which Charlotte said has made them stronger than ever.
